swap.settings.modal.single.slippage.desc: Here you can control the maximum allowed deviation between your desired price and the actual execution price. Such deviation can be caused by protocol fees, price impact (trade size vs liquidity), or price changes due to trading activity.

market.warn.useDca: Your trade may be too large for efficient Split Trade execution - please try our DCA page or increase slippage to ensure successful execution.

dca.settings.modal.title: DCA settings
dca.settings.modal.description: Tolerated price deviation from the last known price. Trade will be rescheduled if the price changes more than the specified percentage since previous block or 10 block average.
